title: Steadfast Maul
content:
Steadfast Maul Uncommon 3~13 Damage 2d6+1Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +1 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A weapon of dwarven make: elegant, but strong enough to last several human lifetimes. MaulTwo-Handed 4.5 65

2d6+1Bludgeoning

Weapon Enchantment +1

Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway.
